knimeNode.name: openBIS Aggregated Data File Importer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Importing a data file from special openBIS aggregation services

fullDescription.intro:
This node invokes an openBIS aggregation services which is specialized to create from some input parameter a file which is delivered to the node at execution time.
For more details see openBIS KNIME Nodes.

ports.outPort: URI of the imported data file.
